sourcesContent:
import useFecth from "./usefectch"; import Videocontent from "./video" const SearchResult= ({name}) => { const {data:searchResult, isPending, error, setUrl} = useFecth('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=05b670c12d1973fe82919a005ef06481&query='+name); const base_url = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500'; return (
{searchResult && searchResult.results.filter(element => element.poster_path!=null && element.title!=null && element.overview!=null).map((res)=>

{res.title}

{res.vote_average} {res.vote_count/1000}k votes
{res.overview}
)}
); } export default SearchResult;
